The user below me will post a short comedic story about the adventures of the kraken in KSP.

False

The user below me is good at art.

True, I'd like to think (shame the previous was false).

The user below me has never attempted any of the challenges on the forums.

Bullpoo! K-prize just forces me to play as I regularly do!

But the user below ME will post a short comedic story about the adventures of the kraken in KSP.

True (though my comedy is rather bland, I will try):

A short while ago, in a solar system far far out of the atmosphere, the renowned Space Kraken nested. Sprawling throughout the entirety of space, this gargantuan savage flung his buggy tentacles at any passing craft. But then, one day, a monolith reacted. The Kraken had gone too far, and the almighty SQUAD descended with a galactic bugwhip. The Kraken was devestated, dissipating disastrously across the vast expanse of the Kerbol system. His relatively tiny remains now lie on what was once his kidney stone - Bop.

The user below likes the idea of boats in the game.

Oh, man how did you guess, hate all the complainers dispite there actually being plans for submursibles (to travel in europa)... anyways
